input.sentences: it is always brings smiles to the faces of others to see people comminting themselves to each other
output.sentences: Sheri loves Aaron and she chose this special wedding day to commemorate that fact.
There were smiles and whispered commenting from the happy, watching people as the bride and groom exchanged vows.
Rice was thrown over the happy couple and then the rest of us went in to admire the beautiful decorations and find our seat.
I didn't know all of the guests, but they all appeared happy, laughing and talking together.
There was a great mix of old and new music that we all enjoyed dancing and listening to.
